thread.title: Escaped Turkey ET:QW servers for $10 a month!

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
unranked, but $10 a month for 32 players! woot woot!

There's a Dallas location & a Washington DC location!

Public or priviate, bots or no bots, maps, mods, etc., whatever you want. At that price you can run ~3-5 servers for the price of other companies!
